engrams.name: Charcoal
engrams.description: Created by burning wood.

engrams.name: Gasoline
engrams.description: An advanced fuel. Can only be used in machines designed to consume it.

engrams.name: Metal Ingot
engrams.description: Created by refining metal ore in a forge.

engrams.name: Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Reinforced Trapdoor
engrams.description: This small reinforced door can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Reinforced Window
engrams.description: Reinforced window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Reinforced Wooden Door
engrams.description: A reinforced wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Roof
engrams.description: An inclined stone roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Stone Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable brick-and-mortar ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Stone Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Stone Doorframe
engrams.description: A stone wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Stone Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Stone Fireplace
engrams.description: A nice, relaxing fireplace. Keeps a large area very warm and provides light.

engrams.name: Stone Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from brick-and-mortar.

engrams.name: Stone Hatchframe
engrams.description: This brick-and-mortar ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Stone Pillar
engrams.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Stone Railing
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar railing that acts as a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Stone Staircase
engrams.description: A stone spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Stone Wall
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Stone Windowframe
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Spear
engrams.description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used.

engrams.name: Stone Hatchet
engrams.description: A sharp flint hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

engrams.name: Stone Pick
engrams.description: A large stone pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and raw meat from bodies.

engrams.name: Torch
engrams.description: Provides light, and some warmth. Doubles as a melee weapon in a pinch.

engrams.name: Wooden Club
engrams.description: A easily made melee weapon that is excellent for knocking out targets. Only effective at short range.

engrams.name: Bola
engrams.description: Wind it up and throw!

engrams.name: Bow
engrams.description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerors. Requires arrows to fire.

engrams.name: Slingshot
engrams.description: A simple ranged weapon that deals damage from afar. Better for knocking out a target than killing it outright. Requires stone to fire.

engrams.name: Ballista Turret
engrams.description: Survivors can mount this and fire devastating ballista arrows, useful for bringing down large dinos and structures!

engrams.name: Behemoth Gate
engrams.description: A large metal-plated concrete gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

engrams.name: Behemoth Gateway
engrams.description: A large metal-plated concrete gateway, reinforced with obsidian polymer, that can be used with a Behemoth Gate to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

engrams.name: Catapult Turret
engrams.description: Mount this to throw destructive Boulders at your enemies, particularly effective against Structures.

engrams.name: Giant Metal Hatchframe
engrams.description: This giant metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Giant Metal Trapdoor
engrams.description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Catwalk
engrams.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from metal plates.

engrams.name: Metal Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable metal-plated concrete ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Metal Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large metal gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large metal gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Door
engrams.description: A stable metal-plated concrete door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Metal Doorframe
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Metal Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Metal Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy metal-plated concrete.

engrams.name: Metal Hatchframe
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Metal Ladder
engrams.description: A simple metal ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Metal Pillar
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is built under. Can also act as stilts for building on inclines.

engrams.name: Metal Railing
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Metal Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined metal-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Metal Spike Wall
engrams.description: These incredibly sharp metal spikes are dangerous to any that touch them. Large creatures take more damage.

engrams.name: Metal Staircase
engrams.description: A metal spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Metal Trapdoor
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Metal Tree Platform
engrams.description: Attaches to a large tree, enabling you to build on it.

engrams.name: Metal Wall
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Metal Window
engrams.description: Metal plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Metal Windowframe
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Primitive Cannon
engrams.description: A powerful, heavy weapon of war, capable of demolishing heavily reinforced structures.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Roof
engrams.description: An inclined metal roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Wall Torch
engrams.description: A torch on a metal connector that lights and warms the immediate area. Must be placed on a wall.

engrams.name: Metal Sword
engrams.description: The undisputed ruler of short-range combat. Needs a hotter flame to be forged.
